channel.title: Rstudio Server on Jeffrey W. Hollister
channel.description: Recent content in Rstudio Server on Jeffrey W. Hollister

item.title: RStudio Server on a Chromebook
item.author: jeff.w.hollister@gmail.com (Jeffrey W. Hollister)
item.description: Notes for setting up RStudio Server in a chroot set up chroot sudo sh ~/Downloads/crouton -t cli-extra -n rstudio install R sudo echo "deb http://cran.rstudio.com/bin/linux/ubuntu xenial/" | sudo tee -a /etc/apt/sources.list gpg --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv-key E084DAB9 gpg -a --export E084DAB9 | sudo apt-key add - sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install r-base r-base-dev install RStudio Server sudo apt-get install gdebi-core wget https://download2.rstudio.org/rstudio-server-1.1.383-amd64.deb sudo gdebi rstudio-server-1.1.383-amd64.deb rm rstudio-server-1.1.383-amd64.deb open up firewall sudo apt-get install nano sudo nano /etc/rc.
